name: Security guarantee level
description: It defines the security ‘guarantee level’  whether the instrument is guaranteed by an entity different from the issuer, e.g. by the government. Further information may be found in the Guidance notes to reporting agents on SHS regulation (see https://www.ecb.europa.eu/pub/pdf/other/guidance_notes_to_reporting_agents_on_shs_regulation201705.en.pdf).
